ios.expected_screen: Home View screen for Room Navigation

assertions_checked.details: The bottom navigation bar with Home, Rooms, Scenes, and Settings is visible.

score_justifications.technical: All required elements are present and functioning correctly.
score_justifications.accessibility: The screen appears to be accessible, with good contrast and appropriately sized touch targets.
score_justifications.visual: The screen is well-designed and follows iOS conventions.

conventions_followed: Uses SF Symbols or system-consistent icons
System fonts (SF Pro) or appropriate alternatives
Safe area insets respected (notch, home indicator)

ios.summary: The Home View screen is correctly displayed, adhering to iOS conventions and journey-specific assertions.

ipad.screen_identified: Home View with Connection Error Popup
ipad.expected_screen: Home View screen for Room Navigation

score_justifications.technical: All required elements are present and functioning. There are no bugs.
score_justifications.accessibility: The screen adheres to WCAG AA guidelines, with adequate contrast and appropriately sized touch targets.
score_justifications.visual: The layout is polished, adheres to platform conventions, and presents a clear visual hierarchy.

conventions_followed: Adapts to larger screen (not just scaled up phone UI)
Same iOS conventions for touch targets and typography

ipad.summary: The home view screen is displayed correctly and contains all required elements, including a connection error popup, while adhering to iPadOS conventions.

android.screen_identified: Home View screen for smart home control app
android.expected_screen: Home View screen for Room Navigation

assertions_checked.details: 'Kagami' is visible in the top left corner.
Navigation bar with 'Home', 'Rooms', 'Scenes', and 'Settings' is visible at the bottom.

score_justifications.technical: All required elements are present and functional. No technical issues identified.
score_justifications.accessibility: Good contrast overall, but some text could be slightly larger for improved readability. Touch targets appear to be adequate.
score_justifications.visual: Clean and modern design. Follows Material Design principles. Consistent spacing and visual hierarchy. Could have slightly more padding around some elements.

android.summary: The home view is well-designed and meets all requirements for this phase of the journey. All elements are visible and functional.
recommendations: Consider increasing the font size of some labels for better readability.
Add a bit more padding around interactive elements to improve usability.

score_justifications.technical: All required elements are present and the screen appears to be functioning correctly.
score_justifications.accessibility: The text is large and easily readable. Color contrast is good. Focus is well-defined.
score_justifications.visual: The layout is clean and easy to navigate. The UI is polished and follows platform conventions.

tvos.summary: The Home View screen for Room Navigation is well-designed and meets all requirements.

visionos.summary: The Home View screen loads successfully with all required elements visible and adhering to visionOS platform conventions.
